articles.description: The James Webb Space Telescope has zoomed in on Leo P, a tiny galaxy with some big things to say about star formation.
articles.content:
What it is: The Leo P dwarf galaxy
Where it is: 5.3 million light-years away in the constellation Leo
When it was shared: Jan. 16, 2025
Why it's so special: Large galaxies like our own Milky Way
… [+2887 chars]

articles.author: Rupendra Brahambhatt
articles.title: LIGO to detect gravitational waves from 13 million light-years further with new device - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: A newly developed optical device promises to significantly enhance LIGO's ability to detect gravitational waves by boosting laser power.
articles.content: The US also has plans to make a gravitational wave detector 10 times the size of LIGO. The proposed observatory is named the Cosmic Explorer, and if everything goes as planned, it will be operational… [+786 chars]
